name: Rock Salamander
description: The Rock Salamander is a tiny elemental creature, agile and stealthy, capable of moving through rocky environments with ease. It has a thin, elongated body which blends in with rocky surroundings, enabling it to hide effectively.
memorable: Unique abilities like Earth Glide and Stone Camouflage make it a formidable opponent in rocky terrains.
goals: To ambush intruders in its rocky environment and manipulate stone for tactical advantages.
relations: Often found in rocky areas, it may be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or in the service of earth deities.
environment: Typically resides in rocky environments or caves.
strengths: Immunity to poison and several debilitating conditions makes it a resilient foe.
weaknesses: Very low Strength and Charisma scores limit its combat ability and social interactions.
attacks: It can perform a melee bite attack dealing 6 piercing damage within a 5-foot range.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide allows it to burrow silently through stone, providing tactical options for ambushes.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to sense vibrations in the ground up to 60 feet away.
skills: Has a perception skill modifier of +1, indicating an average level of awareness.
additional_information: Can manipulate stone to create tactical effects like knocking opponents prone or restraining them.
Grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in rocky terrain.
Can climb difficult stone surfaces without needing an ability check.
Resilient to exhaustion, paralysis, petrification, poison, and unconsciousness.
test_queries: stealthy tiny elemental with rock manipulation
creature that burrows silently through stone
small rock creature immune to poison
agile salamander that can climb walls
